71553.「<cs_pchero>さま……。\n そこにいる災厄の王は 実体ではありません:
<cs_pchero>... The King of Calamity there is
not an entity. He is the shadow of a king
created by illusion.

71554.「影を倒さねば その場に掛けられた幻術を\n 解くことは できません。王者のチカ:
Without defeating the shadow, it is impossible to break the spell that has been cast over the place. Please defeat him once again with the
power of a champion!

71555.「さすがは 時の王者 <cs_pchero>さま。\n 王者にふさわしい みごと:
As expected of the champion of time,
<cs_pchero>. It was a splendid battle worthy
of a champion.

71556.「おそらく 災厄の王の実体は\n この奥にいるのでしょう。:
Perhaps the entity of the King of Calamity is
in the back here.

71557.「幻術を解くためには 彼のチカラが必要……。\n 私たちが 世告げの姫となったの:
To break the spell, we need his power...
everything that made us the Oracle Princess
was for this moment.

71559.「我らの身に宿りし 王の使者よ。\n 今こそ 道を示してください。:
O messenger of the King who dwells in our
bodies. Now is the time to show us the way.

71560.「災厄の王……今は そう呼ばれる 地獄の王は\n もともと善良な心を持ち この世:
The King of Calamity, as he is now called, the King of Hell, was originally one of the good- hearted heroes who tried to make peace in this
world.

71561.「ですが 誰よりも強く 優しい心を持っていた\n 英雄は 大いなる闇の根源に取り:
But the hero, who had the strongest and kindest heart of all, was taken in by a great source of darkness and turned into a monster
bent on destruction.

71562.「災厄の王が 魔物となる前……\n まだ 正気を保っていた頃の理性……。\n そ:
The boy's true identity is the reason why the
King of Calamity, before he became a monster,
was still in his right mind.

71563.「王の身体より追放された理性は\n ある目的を果たすために\n 少年の姿となって:
Banished from the body of the king, Reason
took the form of a boy and began to act in
order to fulfill a certain purpose.

71564.「その目的とは 闇のチカラに支配された\n 自身の暴走を止めること……。そのため:
The purpose is to stop the power of darkness
from taking control of us, and for that
purpose, we have been made Oracle Princesses.

71565.「おねえちゃんたち…… ボクを\n ここまで連れてきてくれて ありがとう……。:
Young ladies... thank you for bringing me
here...

71566.「私たち 世告げの姫は……\n これから どうすればよいのですか？: What are we, the Oracle Princesses, to do now?

71567.「おねえちゃんたちは もう自由だよ。\n これからは ひとつ願いがかなった世界で:
You are free now, young ladies. From now on,
please live in a world where one wish comes
true.

71570.「……うん！\n ここから先は ボクが がんばる番だ！:
Yeah! From here on out, it's my turn to do my
best!

71571.「……ただ 今度は あなたに\n ひとつ 手伝ってほしい。:
I just need your help with one thing this
time.

71572.「王には ６つの理性があって\n それぞれ 世告げの姫たちに導かれて\n この場:
The king had six minds, each guided by an
Oracle Princess, and they were to be gathered
in this place.

71573.「そして すべての理性が戻ることで\n あの災厄の王を 元の勇敢な王の姿に\n:
And with the return of all reason, I was able
to restore that King of Calamity to his
original, brave form...

71574.「だけど ふたりの世告げの姫が殺された時\n ふたつの理性が いっしょに消えてし:
But when the two Oracle Princesses were
killed, the two rationalities disappeared
together.

71575.「だから 今のボクでは もう王を\n 元に戻してあげることが できない。\n 今:
So, I can no longer restore the king to his
former self. All I can do now is this...

71576.「ボクが この場所の幻術を解きます。: I will break the illusion of this place.

71577.「あなたには この先にいる\n 本当の災厄の王を 倒してほしい。:
I want you to defeat the real King of Calamity
down the road.

71578.「本当の災厄の王は さっきの影とは\n 比べものにならないほど強いよ。\n 倒す:
The real King of Calamity is far stronger than
the shadow you just saw. It may be impossible
to defeat him.

71579.「でも 戦うしかないんだ……。\n それ以外に この世界を\n 滅びの運命から救:
But we have to fight... there is no other way
to save this world from destruction.

71581.「幻術が 解かれたことで\n この世界の本当の姿が 現れたのですね……。:
The true nature of this world was revealed
when the illusion was broken.

71582.「<cs_pchero>さま。\n あちらの扉を ご覧ください。: <cs_pchero>. Please see the door over there.

71583.「あの先から まがまがしい邪気を感じます。\n おそらく あの扉は\n 本当の災:
I can feel the evil spirit of the evil one
from beyond that door. Perhaps that door leads
to the real King of Calamity...

71584.「時の王者である <cs_pchero>さまのチカラで\n どうか 災厄の王を倒:
Please use the power of <cs_pchero>, the
champion of time, to defeat the King of
Calamity. Only then will the world be saved...

71585.「私たちが協力できるのは ここまでのようです。\n 私たちの世界……アストルティ:
It seems that our cooperation goes only so
far. Please protect our world...the future of
Astoltia.

71586.「<cs_pchero>さま……。\n どうやら それ以上は 無理なようです。:
<cs_pchero>... apparently you can't go any
further than that.

71587.「元の勇敢な王に戻すことも この場で倒し\n 消し去ることも できないのならば…:
If we cannot restore him to the brave king he
once was, or defeat and extinguish him here
and now...

71588.「せめて 二度と動けぬように\n 地の底深くに 封印するしかありません。:
At the very least, we have to seal it deep
into the earth so that it can never move
again.

71589.「その役目は 私たち……\n 世告げの姫が 果たしましょう。:
We, the Oracle Princess, will fulfill that
role.

71590.「<cs_pchero>さまが ここに向かわれた後……\n あの少年に頼んで ふ:
After <cs_pchero> left for this place I
asked the boy to give me back the power of the
Oracle Princess.

71591.「私たち ４人の世告げの姫のチカラと\n 天使が残した この白星剣の霊力にて\n:
With the Four Oracle Princesses' power and spiritual power of the White Star Sword left by an angel, we'll seal the King of Calamity
in the depths of the earth forever.

71592.「それで このアストルティアは\n 救われましょう……。: So let us save this Astoltia...

71593.「おねえちゃんたちは もう自由だよ。\n これからは ひとつ願いがかなった世界で:
You are free now, young ladies. From now on,
please live in a world where one wish comes
true.

71594.「ひとつ 願いがかなった世界……。: One world where wishes come true...

71595.「絶望の淵にいた私たちに あの少年は\n 生きる希望を 与えてくれました。:
We were in the depths of despair, but that boy
gave us hope for life.

71596.「私たちには それだけで充分。\n 今は 愛すべき このアストルティアを\n 守:
That is enough for us. For now, our only wish
is to protect our beloved Astoltia.

71597.「これでよいのです。\n 後悔など ありません。: It's all right. I have no regrets.

71598.「私の願いは 私の偽りの予言で\n 亡くなった人たちへ 罪滅ぼしをすること。\n:
My wish is to atone for those who died because
of my false prophecy. Now I can fulfill that
wish.

71599.「<cs_pchero>さまのおかげで\n 大切な思い出を 取り戻すことができま:
Thanks to <cs_pchero>, we have our precious
memories back. Thank you very much.

71600.「愛する人が生きる 愛する世界のために\n 我が身を 捧げることができる……。\:
What could be a better wish than to be able to
give of myself for the sake of the world in
which my loved ones live and love?

71601.「ありがとうございます。\n すべて <cs_pchero>さまの おかげです。:
Thank you very much. All thanks to
<cs_pchero>.

71602.「……<cs_pchero>さま。\n 最後に これを お渡ししましょう。:
...<cs_pchero>. Finally, let me give you
this.

71603.「そのルーラストーンは\n 自分の故郷に帰るための 特別な物。\n 行き先を 書:
The Zoomstone is a special item that allows
you to return to your home town. It is not
possible to rewrite the destination.

71604.「私たちは 故郷を失ってしまいましたが……\n <cs_pchero>さまは ど:
We have lost our home but <cs_pchero> please
never forget your home.

71605.「これが 私たち世告げの姫の 最後の使命です。:
This is the last mission of us, the Oracle
Princesses.

71608.「大いなる闇の根源に 取り込まれる前の\n あなたは 世界の平和のためにチカラを:
Before you were taken in by the great source of darkness, you were a great hero who did everything in his power For Peace in the
world...

71609.「ただ怒りに任せて 暴虐の限りを尽くすのは\n あなたも 本意ではないはず……。:
It's not your intention to just go on an angry
rampage of tyranny...

71611.「私たちも 永遠に あなたと運命を共にします。: We, too, will share your fate forever.

71612.「ねぇねぇ 大丈夫？: Hey, hey, hey. Are you okay?

71614.「あたしも 気がついたら ここにいたのよ！\n ロディアおねえちゃんと いっしょ:
I found myself here, too! I was with Rhodia,
and now I can't find her anywhere!

71615.「もう いやんなっちゃうわ。\n おねえちゃんったら どこ行ったのかしら。:
I'm getting so tired of it. I wonder where
young lady went.

71618.「な…なんでだろう？\n 今 星の声が 聞こえた気がするの。: What...why? I think I just heard the stars.

72166.「戻れる……？\n 自由に歩くことのできる世界へ……。:
Can we go back...? To a world where you can
walk freely...

79368.「こんな所で寝てたら カゼひくよ。: You'll catch a cold if you sleep here.
